title: Insurance navigation support reduces administrative burden
description: Insurance navigation support reduces administrative burden
content:
Scenario: Insurance navigation support reduces administrative burden
    Given medical insurance is byzantine and frustrating
    And James must manage claims, authorizations, coverage
    When the healthcare_elohim assists with insurance
    Then it should help James navigate insurance processes
    And it should track claims and identify problems
    And it should assist with authorization requirements
    And it should escalate coverage denials for appeal
    And insurance complexity should not prevent needed care
